name: Stockholm 2026 - Low Income (Below State Tax Threshold)
description: Single person earning SEK 250,000 in Stockholm

sources.description: Based on Swedish Tax Agency 2026 rates: Stockholm municipal tax 30.55%, grundavdrag SEK 17,400, jobbskatteavdrag=0 (income above phase5 threshold)
sources.notes: Taxable: 250,000 - 17,400 = 232,600. Municipal tax: 232,600 Ã— 30.55% = 71,059. State tax: 0. Work credit: 0 (simplified model). Net tax: 71,059. Net: 178,941. Effective rate: 28.42%
